import { Box, Button, Dialog, DialogActions, DialogContent, DialogContentText, DialogTitle, Grid, IconButton, TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Add } from "@material-ui/icons"; const FormDialog = ({ informations, setInformations, saveInformations, openDialog, closeDialog }) => { return (

(setInformations({ ...informations, fields: e.target.value }))} /> (setInformations({ ...informations, fieldSelector: e.target.value }))} />
); } export default FormDialog;
